name: Model optimization
description:
Script for optimization using SMACdown.  The script can be used for both classification and regression ensembles, provided you select the appropriate metric to be optimized (see below).

Classification metrics:

- average_recall

- average_phi

- accuracy

- average_precision

- average\_f\_measure

Regression metrics:

- r_squared.

inputs.name: train-id
inputs.description: Training dataset for which we are seeking an optimal model

inputs.name: validation-id
inputs.description: Held out data to use for model selection.  If not specified, a randomly selected subset of the training instances are used for the validation set.

inputs.name: test-id
inputs.description: A dataset on which to evaluate the final selected model, for the purposes of performance estimation.  If not specified, the validation set is used.

inputs.name: objective-id
inputs.description: The objective field, or 'default' to use the dataset's default

inputs.name: metric
inputs.description: Metric to optimize.  Can be average_recall, average_phi, accuracy, average_precision, average_f_measure for classification or r_squared for regression.

inputs.name: test-model
inputs.description: Whether to try individual trees in the search

inputs.name: test-ensemble
inputs.description: Whether to try decision forests in the search

inputs.name: test-boosting
inputs.description: Whether to try boosted ensembles in the search

inputs.name: test-logistic
inputs.description: Whether to try logistic regression in the search

inputs.name: delete-resources
inputs.description: Whether to delete all intermediate resources
